InstalledItem.Name: Arbor MH2 Mining Laser
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 2

Optimal Range: 60m
Maximum Range: 300m

Power Transfer: 1850
Extraction Throughput: 0.35 SCU/s
Module Slots: 1

The Arbor MH2 is the size two version of Greycat's heralded Arbor mining laser series. Like the smaller variant, the Arbor MH2's solid, reliable design found favor among industrial and solo operations for effectively balancing speed and safety.

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

When you’re in the middle of an important job, you don’t want to waste time wondering if your cooler is doing its part. Now you don’t have to. With the dependable mid-level ThermalCore cooler from Juno Starwerk onboard, you can take all the guesswork out of heat management.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 3

The unique name for this stalwart industrial power plant was inspired by the nickname of a Juno Starwerk junior engineer who helped design it.

InstalledItem.Name: Huracan
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

Juno Starwerk understands that your most important job is to keep your cargo safe. That’s why their Huracan quantum drive prioritizes interdiction shielding, stability, and damage efficiency above everything else.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.
